now.title: 2D-Friendly Weight Editor
now.desc: Enhance the current weight-painting experience, visualization, and usability.

next.title: 2D-Friendly Morph Target Editor
next.desc: A morph target editor tailored for 2D workflows and common use cases.

next.title: Layer Mask Editor
next.desc: WYSIWYG mask painting, blending, and preview to speed up artist iteration.

next.title: Layer Mask Runtime
next.desc: Apply masks at runtime and expose a Blueprint API for level and gameplay integration.

milestones.title: v1.0 beta
milestones.notes: Core 2D toolchain available with base documentation.

milestones.title: v1.0
milestones.notes: Migrated from the old Factory import system to the new Interchange.
